title: Jacobs and Palantir Launch Global Strategic Partnership for Data Solutions
text: DALLAS and DENVER, March 2, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- Jacobs (NYSE:J) and Palantir Technologies Inc. ("Palantir," NYSE: PLTR) today announced a global strategic collaboration targeting data and technology solutions for the infrastructure and national security markets. The near-term focus of the relationship is the water sector – a critical enabling infrastructure – and involves the launch of a joint data analytics offering to support public and private sector clients in solving their most complex water infrastructure problems.
